sagrada_familia.name: Sagrada Família
sagrada_familia.description: Experience an unforgettable visit to the temple of light, the work of Antoni Gaudí and a UNESCO World Heritage site.

casa_batllo.name: Batlló House
casa_batllo.description: Feel the architectural splendor of early 20th-century Barcelona on Passeig de Gràcia, surrounded by memories of a remarkable era.

la_pedrera.name: La Pedrera
la_pedrera.description: Visit La Pedrera and enter the world of Antoni Gaudí. Discover firsthand how nature is the origin and inspiration for the building.

park_guell.name: Park Güell
park_guell.description: The ticket allows access to the area where the most significant works of Antoni Gaudí, declared a UNESCO World Heritage site, are located, as well as green areas and panoramic views of Barcelona.

palau_musica.name: Palace of Catalan Music
palau_musica.description: Enjoy a self-guided visit to the Palace of Catalan Music with an explanatory brochure.

tibidabo.name: Tibidabo
tibidabo.description: Tibidabo Amusement Park offers an unforgettable experience with over 30 attractions, shows, and activities, all with the best views of Barcelona.

camp_nou.name: Spotify Camp Nou Museum
camp_nou.description: Dive into the new 100% interactive museum, where you can travel through the past, present, and future of Barça, featuring historical moments, legendary players, and triumphs that form part of the collective imagination.
